subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bolt was a golfer whose swing helped him win the 1958 United States Open but whose success was overshadowed by his reputation for throwing tantrums.
snippet: Mr. Bolt was a golfer whose swing helped him win the 1958 United States Open but whose success was overshadowed by his reputation for throwing tantrums.
